title: feat: OpenClaw integration â€” landing page, setup script, docs
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Launched a seamless OpenClaw integration with a dedicated landing page and one-line setup script.
gist.impact: OpenClaw users can now instantly power their agents with Pollinations' full model suite, including Kimi, Gemini, and Claude.
gist.image_prompt: Pixel art scene of a friendly robot claw connecting a glowing cable to a blooming digital flower patch tended by the Pollinations bee. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Pixel text 'OpenClaw'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
